Microsoft PowerToys

Summary

Collection of useful tools for Microsoft Windows power users.

Utilities Included

Always on Top

Pin windows to the top along z-axis

PowerToys Always On Top utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Color Picker

desktop-wide eyedropper via SUPER-SHIFT-c

PowerToys Color Picker utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Command Not Found

Suggest Winget packages for missing commands in PowerShell

PowerToys Command Not Found for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Crop And Lock

Crop / resize windows or generate thumbnails

PowerToys Crop And Lock for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Environment Variables

Better profile and environment management

PowerToys Environment Variables for Windows | Microsoft Learn

FancyZones

Window snapping handler for simple tiling layout management

PowerToys FancyZones utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

File Explorer Add-ons

Extra filetypes for File Explorer Preview Pane

PowerToys File Explorer add-ons utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

File Locksmith

See which processes are using what files

PowerToys File Locksmith utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Hosts File Editor

/etc/hosts but Windows

PowerToys Hosts File Editor utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Image Resizer utility

Batch image resizing

PowerToys Image Resizer utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Keyboard Manager

Redefine keyboard key codes

PowerToys Keyboard Manager utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Mouse utilities

Enhance mouse and cursor functionality

PowerToys Mouse utilities for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Mouse Without Borders

control multiple computers from one machine

PowerToys Mouse Without Borders | Microsoft Learn

Paste as Plain Text

PowerToys Paste as Plain Text for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Peek

quick file preview

PowerToys Peek utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

PowerRename

bulk rename for files

PowerToys PowerRename utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

PowerToys Awake

Keep computer awake without fussing with power & sleep

PowerToys Awake utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

PowerToys Run

quick launcher withALT-SPACE

PowerToys Run utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Quick Accent

PowerToys Quick Accent utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Registry Preview

Simplify visualizing and editing complex Windows Registry files

PowerToys Registry Preview for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Screen Ruler

measure pixel regions

PowerToys Screen ruler utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Shortcut Guide

Display common keyboard shortcuts that use Win / Super

PowerToys Shortcut Guide utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Text Extractor

OCR Screen capture

PowerToys Text Extractor utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Video Conference Mute

master switch for mic and video

PowerToys Video Conference Mute utility for Windows | Microsoft Learn

Related
